headline: SLB: Venezuelan Oil Can Revitalize Oilfield Services Growth (Rating Upgrade)

headline: Assessing SLB’s Valuation After A Strong 90 Day Share Price Rally
summary: What SLB’s Recent Share Performance Might Signal for Investors SLB (SLB) has caught investor attention after a recent stretch of positive share performance, with the stock moving higher over the past week, month, and past 3 months despite a daily pullback. See our latest analysis for SLB. The strong 90 day share price return of 27.89% and 1 year total shareholder return of 12.63% suggest momentum has been building recently, even though the 3 year total shareholder return remains a loss of...

headline: SLB (SLB) Is Up 10.4% After Aramco Stimulation Win And New Cameron Partnership - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In early January 2026, Indigenous-owned Motif Valve & Supply announced it had become an official distribution partner for SLB’s Cameron valve brands across Western Canada, while SLB also secured a large five-year stimulation services contract from Aramco for Saudi Arabia’s unconventional gas program and benefited from renewed interest in Venezuela’s oil sector. Taken together with recent analyst upgrades and options activity, these agreements and geopolitical developments highlight how SLB’s...
